page.title: 17EDUC.-LILLESHALL&CH.ASTON
page.content: {Under 5's}Church Aston Playgroup Lilleshall Playgroup {5-11yrs }Church Aston Infant School Lilleshall C.P School Moorfield Primary School {11-18yrs}Burton Borough School Newport Adam's Grammar School Newport Girls' High School Newport 6th Form College Wellington College Of Arts&Technology { Numbers on Roll for July 1985 Lilleshall Playgroup(48) Lilleshall C.P. School(169) Church Aston Playgroup(26) Church Aston Infant School(60) The two village schools look very different.Church Aston School is an old building with outside toilets, whereas Lilleshall is a very modern building completed in 1984.This area of Shropshire is still involved in the {11+ Examination.}
